extendedInfo.description: Search the US's largest online job site on the go with CareerBuilder's Jobs app. It's powerful, easy to use, and completely free.Features include:-	Search for jobs with advanced search options-	Use your current location to find jobs near you-	Apply to jobs with your CareerBuilder account-       Register an account from within the app-       Login with your Facebook account-       Have a resume saved on your phone or Dropbox account? Upload it from within the app-       See data about who else has applied to jobs with Job Competition reports from the Applied Jobs view-       Share jobs with your friends via text message, email and Facebook-       Keep up to date with the status of your job applications by taking a short survey-	Save jobs to review later-	Receive personal job recommendations-	Get a list of jobs similar to any job you like-	Apply to jobs without being logged in or registered with CareerBuilder-       Attach resume file from your phone for applying-	Automatically syncs your resumes, cover letters, saved jobs, and jobs you have applied to with your CareerBuilder account-      Support for in-app screening questions

reviews.title: outstanding !!
reviews.comment: have had more employer and potential position interviews than ever before... thank you careerbuilder keep up the great work
reviews.author: Lee Holton

reviews.title: Found a job
reviews.comment: Posted my resume, filled out an app, got called back in two hours for an interview, went to my interview the next day and two days later got a offered the position
reviews.author: Tieara Cannon

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: It makes job hunting much easier and even allows you to save multiple resumes and even view history of jobs that you applied for. Thanks for this very helpful ap!
reviews.author: Erin Curfiss

reviews.title: Great exposure
reviews.comment: Ability to upload your resume and apply with mobile device.  You can  create and save a cover letter and edit it before submitting!  Jobs also frequently updated.
reviews.author: Kim Peoples

reviews.title: Great app but with a few bugs
reviews.comment: Very easy to use, fast, efficient. However, does forget the Saved Jobs sometimes.
reviews.author: Varun Maharaj

reviews.title: Unable to load jobs
reviews.comment: So for the past three days it shows new jobs. When I click search its \"unable to load jobs\". Waste of space on my phone. Sticking with Indeed
reviews.author: Emily P

reviews.title: Good but..
reviews.comment: I love that I can look for a job and it\'s incredibly easy to use. Would just love to be able to make an account. Keeps saying to try later. Other than that,  awesome app!
reviews.author: Melissa Clarke

reviews.title: \343\203\204U betta \342\207\251load ASAP!!!
reviews.comment: i \342\207\251loaded 830\343\217\202 around 1200\343\217\230 i was called for an interview! CB is def a gr8 app to use seeking employment ! word\342\207\247
reviews.author: Sa\'Diyya \'Ayisha

reviews.title: App is garbage.
reviews.comment: Won\'t even let you register.
reviews.author: Chad Hutton

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: The businesses are either spam type liars (door to door sales jobs marketing as needing a college degree type position) or people who interview and never respond. There is such potential here, remove the dishonest companies and educate the ones that are legitimate. Then you\'ve got a fantastic site.
reviews.author: Michael Cromwell

reviews.title: Problems loading
reviews.comment: I\'m about to delete this app.....continous problems logging in and once I am logged in, it takes forever to load a new search.. so faustrated with this crap!!!
reviews.author: Barbara Cintron

reviews.title: Pretty good.
reviews.comment: Cannot create account.
reviews.author: jerry delay

reviews.title: Not kewl
reviews.comment: It won\'t let me register and it won\'t let me apply to any jobs. Useless
reviews.author: nathan gunn

reviews.title: Needs works.
reviews.comment: I used the CB app on a 1st gen iPhone and was always happy with it. This app is missing one huge feature that I had before, the date the listing was made. On the iPhone app I  was able to know if I had scrolled far enough to get to listing I had seen, based on date, with this one I can\'t tell. I don\'t even know if I\'m seeing recent listings, or old ones. Applying for a job is still as easy as can be though.
reviews.author: Craig Pifer

reviews.comment: I love this app! It is so convenient!
reviews.author: krystina daniels

reviews.title: Fix please
reviews.comment: Keeps saying internet connection is disconnected and it wont let me register. Waste of time and space
reviews.author: Jessica Hernandez

reviews.title: Job application
reviews.comment: Every time i put my information in it keeps saying error try again later..Then try later and still say the same thing..
reviews.author: ruby mcclendon

reviews.title: something is not right
reviews.comment: Can\'t add or remove resumes can\'t search for jobs based on my resume, only be keyword.  I guess ill keep using the website
reviews.author: Dave LeBlanc

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great source for finding a job clients that post jobs on this site really look into your application
reviews.author: Albert Jones

reviews.title: Unable to load jobs
reviews.comment: Past 2 days cannot see any jobs. Keeps saying unable to load jobs!!
reviews.author: frank trzcinski
